featured.text: Moran began painting by age 15, inspired by the landscape paintings of the British master J.M.W. Turner.

definition.zh_def: 轉動器，特別是用於木工或金屬加工的機械，能夠將材料旋轉以進行加工。
definition.en_def: A machine or tool that rotates a workpiece to shape it, especially in woodworking or metalworking.
definition.example: The woodworker used a turner to create a beautifully shaped bowl.
